text: The Berliner Lokal-Anzeiger was a daily newspaper published in Berlin, with one of the highest national circulations of its time. Its publisher was newspaper magnate August Scherl, who also owned Die Woche, an illustrated weekly. == References== == External links == Category:1883 establishments in Germany Category:1945 disestablishments in Germany Category:Defunct newspapers published in Germany Category:German-language newspapers Category:Publications established in 1883 Category:Publications disestablished in 1945 Category:Weekly newspapers published in Germany
title: Berliner Lokal-Anzeiger
